title: Super Mario Bros.
desc: The game that saved the video game industry! Mario's tight controls, hidden secrets, and perfect level design created the blueprint for all platformers. That iconic jump sound is gaming history!

title: The Legend of Zelda
desc: The birth of open-world adventure! Link's quest for the Triforce introduced non-linear exploration, hidden dungeons, and that magical feeling of discovery. 'It's dangerous to go alone!'

title: Metroid
desc: Samus Aran's debut revolutionized gaming! Atmospheric alien worlds, isolation, power-ups that unlock new areas, and THAT ending reveal that shocked the world. A sci-fi masterpiece!

title: Castlevania
desc: Simon Belmont's whip-cracking vampire hunt! Gothic horror atmosphere, challenging platforming, memorable boss battles, and a hauntingly beautiful soundtrack!

title: Mega Man 2
desc: The Blue Bomber at his best! Eight Robot Masters, brilliant weapon variety, pixel-perfect gameplay, and Dr. Wily's fortress. That soundtrack is legendary!

title: Super Mario Bros. 3
desc: Mario's masterpiece! Power-ups galore, world maps, secrets everywhere, and the Tanooki Suit! This is platforming perfection!

title: Contra
desc: Up, Up, Down, Down... The Konami Code! Two-player co-op chaos against alien invaders. Hard as nails but so satisfying!

title: Final Fantasy
desc: The game that saved Square! Four Warriors of Light begin an epic journey. Turn-based combat and fantasy storytelling at its finest!

title: Dragon Quest
desc: The grandfather of JRPGs! Akira Toriyama's art style and classic hero's journey started it all in Japan!

title: Tetris
desc: The perfect puzzle game! Falling blocks, addictive gameplay, and that Russian folk music. Simple concept, infinite replayability!

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
desc: SEGA's blue blur! Speed, attitude, and loop-de-loops! Green Hill Zone's theme is pure nostalgia. Sonic vs Mario defined a generation!

title: Street Fighter II
desc: Hadouken! The fighting game that launched a genre! Eight world warriors, perfect controls, and competitive gaming was born!

title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
desc: The definitive 2D Zelda! Light and Dark Worlds, brilliant dungeons, the Master Sword, and perfection in every pixel!

title: Super Metroid
desc: The peak of 2D gaming! Atmosphere, exploration, isolation on Planet Zebes. That escape sequence is unforgettable! The baby...

title: Chrono Trigger
desc: Time-traveling perfection! Dream Team collaboration, multiple endings, no random battles, New Game+, and Frog's theme! A timeless masterpiece!

title: Final Fantasy VI
desc: Kefka wins! The darkest Final Fantasy with an opera scene, ensemble cast, and that villain who actually destroys the world. Epic!

title: Super Mario World
desc: Mario's 16-bit debut! Yoshi, Cape Feather, 96 exits, secret Star World, and that joyful soundtrack. SNES perfection!

title: Donkey Kong Country
desc: Pre-rendered graphics stunned the world! DK and Diddy's comeback with incredible level design and David Wise's atmospheric soundtrack!

title: Earthbound
desc: Quirky, weird, wonderful! Modern-day RPG with psychic kids, bizarre enemies, and touching moments. Underappreciated genius!

title: Secret of Mana
desc: Three-player co-op action-RPG! Beautiful worlds, ring menu innovation, and a soundtrack that tugs at your heart!

title: Doom
desc: Rip and tear! The game that popularized FPS! Demons on Mars, chainsaws, BFG, and that metal soundtrack. Gaming's most influential shooter!

title: Wolfenstein 3D
desc: Mecha-Hitler! The granddaddy of FPS games! Maze-like levels and Nazis to shoot. id Software changes gaming forever!

title: SimCity 2000
desc: The mayor simulator! Build your city, manage budgets, deal with disasters. Arcologies and Reticulating Splines!

title: Civilization
desc: Just one more turn... Build an empire from 4000 BC to space! Gandhi goes nuclear! Strategy perfection by Sid Meier!

title: Warcraft II
desc: Work work! Orcs vs Humans in real-time strategy! Base building, resource management, and 'Zug zug!' The RTS genre explodes!

title: Super Mario 64
desc: The jump to 3D perfection! Camera control, analog stick movement, 120 Stars to collect, and Bob-omb Battlefield. Gaming enters the third dimension!

title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
desc: Many say this is the greatest game ever made! Z-targeting, time travel, Hyrule Field, and that ocarina! Link's 3D debut is perfection!

title: GoldenEye 007
desc: Bond on N64! Revolutionary console FPS with four-player split-screen! Facility, Oddjob debates, and remote mines. Slaps only!

title: Mario Kart 64
desc: Rainbow Road! Four-player kart racing chaos, blue shells, battle mode! Friendships were tested on that infamous shortcut!

title: Star Fox 64
desc: Do a barrel roll! Rumble Pak innovation, branching paths, memorable quotes, and Andross! The definitive rail shooter!

title: Final Fantasy VII
desc: Cloud's spiky hair and that massive sword! Aerith's moment broke hearts worldwide. Materia system, Midgar, Sephiroth, and three discs of epic storytelling!

title: Metal Gear Solid
desc: Snake? SNAKE! Hideo Kojima's cinematic masterpiece! Stealth gameplay, codec calls, Psycho Mantis reading your memory card! A gaming milestone!

title: Resident Evil
desc: The birth of survival horror! Tank controls, limited ammo, that dog through the window, and 'Jill Sandwich!' The Spencer Mansion terrifies!

title: Resident Evil 2
desc: Leon and Claire in Raccoon City! Two scenarios, Mr. X stalking you, and that police station! Survival horror perfection!

title: Silent Hill
desc: Psychological horror masterpiece! Fog, radio static, Pyramid Head, and that siren! The town itself is a character!

title: Crash Bandicoot
desc: PlayStation's mascot! Spinning into crates, beach levels, and 3D platforming on Sony's console. Woah!

title: Spyro the Dragon
desc: Purple dragon charm! Gliding, flaming enemies, collecting gems, and Stewart Copeland's fantastic soundtrack!

title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2
desc: So here I am... Doing everything I can! The definitive skateboarding game! Create-a-skater, incredible soundtrack, and endless combos!

title: Gran Turismo
desc: The real driving simulator! Hundreds of cars, realistic physics, and licensing tests. Racing games got serious!

title: Tekken 3
desc: The peak of PS1 fighting! Jin Kazama, King's moves, and that bowling minigame! Smooth 3D fighting perfection!

title: Banjo-Kazooie
desc: Bear and bird duo collect Jiggies! Rare's masterpiece with humor, collectathons, and Grunty's rhymes!

title: Perfect Dark
desc: GoldenEye's spiritual successor! Joanna Dark, laptop guns, and bots in multiplayer!

title: Conker's Bad Fur Day
desc: The R-rated Nintendo game! Drunk squirrel, movie parodies, and inappropriate humor!

title: Paper Mario
desc: Mario goes 2D in 3D! Turn-based battles, partners, and witty writing!

title: Diddy Kong Racing
desc: Rare's kart racer with planes and hovercrafts! Adventure mode and Wizpig!

title: Pokémon Red/Blue
desc: Gotta catch 'em all! 151 original Pokémon, link cable trading, and a phenomenon was born!

title: Pokémon Gold/Silver
desc: Two regions! Day/night cycle, breeding, and return to Kanto! The perfect sequel!

title: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening
desc: Zelda on handheld! Dream of Koholint Island, no Zelda or Ganon, pure adventure!

title: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
desc: What is a man? A miserable pile of secrets! Alucard's inverted castle and Metroidvania perfection!

title: Vagrant Story
desc: Yasumi Matsuno's dark fantasy! Complex weapon crafting, Leá Monde, mature storytelling!

title: Parasite Eve
desc: Mitochondria horror in NYC! Aya Brea, spontaneous combustion, and opera house!

title: Xenogears
desc: Giant robots and philosophy! Fei Fong Wong, religious themes, incomplete but brilliant!

title: Suikoden II
desc: 108 Stars of Destiny! War story, betrayal, castle building, and emotional depth!

title: Mega Man X
desc: X and Zero! Dashing, wall-jumping, Mavericks, and that guitar soundtrack!

title: Mega Man X4
desc: What am I fighting for?! Zero's sword slashing and anime cutscenes!

title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
desc: Welcome to the 80s! Tommy Vercetti, neon lights, Ray Liotta, and that soundtrack!

title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
desc: Grove Street! CJ's story, three cities, lowriders, jetpacks, and All You Had To Do Was Follow The Damn Train!

title: God of War
desc: Kratos' rage! Greek mythology, Blades of Chaos, brutal combat, and that twist ending!

title: God of War II
desc: Bigger, badder, more godly! Kratos vs Zeus, Titans, and the peak of PS2!

title: Shadow of the Colossus
desc: 16 giants, one boy, one horse. Minimalist masterpiece! Agro! Climbing colossi! Art!

title: ICO
desc: Hand-holding mechanic! Boy with horns, ethereal girl, minimalist storytelling!

title: Devil May Cry
desc: Dante's stylish demon slaying! SSS combos, Alastor sword, and that theme song!

title: Devil May Cry 3
desc: Dante vs Vergil! Best combat system, Cerberus, Motivation, and that rain scene!

title: Kingdom Hearts
desc: Disney meets Final Fantasy! Sora, Donald, Goofy! Simple and Clean! Heartless!

title: Kingdom Hearts II
desc: Roxas opening, Organization XIII, Drive Forms, and Sanctuary! Reaction Commands!

title: Final Fantasy X
desc: Tidus and Yuna's journey! Sphere Grid, Blitzball, voice acting debut, and To Zanarkand!

title: Final Fantasy XII
desc: Ivalice returns! Gambit system, Vaan and Balthier, single-player MMO feel!

title: Dragon Quest VIII
desc: Cell-shaded beauty! Akira Toriyama's art in 3D, orchestral music, traditional JRPG!

title: Persona 3
desc: Memento Mori! Dark Hour, shooting yourself, social links, and Burn My Dread!

title: Persona 4
desc: Reach out to the truth! TV World murders, Investigation Team, and Teddie!

title: Ratchet & Clank
desc: Lombax and robot! Creative weapons, humor, and Insomniac's brilliance!

title: Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal
desc: Dr. Nefarious! Online multiplayer, RYNO, and refined gameplay!

title: Jak and Daxter
desc: Naughty Dog's platformer! Precursor legacy, seamless world, and ottsel!

title: Jak II
desc: Dark Jak emerges! Guns, vehicles, Haven City, and edgier tone!

title: Sly Cooper
desc: Master thief raccoon! Cell-shaded style, stealth gameplay, and The Thievius Raccoonus!

title: Halo: Combat Evolved
desc: Master Chief arrives! The Flood reveal, Warthog runs, and Xbox is born!

title: Halo 2
desc: Finish the fight! Dual-wielding, Arbiter campaign, Xbox Live revolution, cliffhanger ending!

title: Fable
desc: Peter Molyneux's vision! Good vs evil choices, aging hero, and chicken chasing!

title: Ninja Gaiden
desc: Ryu Hayabusa's brutal return! Insane difficulty, Dragon Sword, precise combat!

title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
desc: BioWare's Star Wars epic! That twist! Light side, dark side, and HK-47!

title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
desc: Cel-shaded sailing! Link's cartoon style, Great Sea exploration, and expressive animations!

title: Metroid Prime
desc: First-person Metroid perfection! Tallon IV, scanning, atmospheric isolation!

title: Super Smash Bros. Melee
desc: Competitive phenomenon! Wavedashing, Fox only Final Destination, and still played today!

title: Resident Evil 4
desc: Over-the-shoulder revolution! Leon's Spain mission, Las Plagas, and THAT chainsaw guy!

title: Eternal Darkness
desc: Sanity effects break the fourth wall! Memory card erasing tricks! Meta horror!

title: Animal Crossing
desc: Tom Nook's debt! Real-time life simulation, furniture collecting, and relaxation!

title: Pikmin
desc: Olimar and tiny plant creatures! RTS on console, time management, adorable deaths!

title: Fire Emblem
desc: Permadeath tactical combat! Roy and Marth's western debut! Support conversations!

title: Advance Wars
desc: Turn-based warfare! CO powers, tank armies, and Nintendo's tactical brilliance!

title: Golden Sun
desc: Djinn collecting RPG! Psynergy, summons, puzzles, and that cliffhanger!

title: Burnout 3: Takedown
desc: Aggressive racing! Crash mode, boost chains, taking down rivals! Pure adrenaline!

title: SSX Tricky
desc: It's tricky! Arcade snowboarding, huge tricks, Run-DMC, and over-the-top fun!

title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
desc: Revert added! Airport level, increased combo potential, peak Tony Hawk!

title: NBA Street Vol. 2
desc: Gamebreakers! Street basketball with style, dunks, and Mario cameo!

title: Madden NFL 2004
desc: Michael Vick on cover! Owner mode, franchise depth, football simulation peak!

title: Guitar Hero
desc: Plastic guitar revolution! Button pressing, rock stardom, and living room concerts!

title: Dance Dance Revolution
desc: Arrow stomping phenomenon! Japanese import, arcade workout, and Konami magic!

title: Katamari Damacy
desc: Roll up everything! Absurdist Japanese brilliance, sticky ball, Na na na...!

title: Okami
desc: Celestial Brush! Wolf goddess Amaterasu, watercolor visuals, Japanese mythology!

title: Psychonauts
desc: Mind-bending levels! Raz explores psychic minds, Tim Schafer's creativity unleashed!

title: Beyond Good & Evil
desc: Jade investigates! Photography, stealth, DomZ conspiracy, underrated gem!

title: Prince of Persia: Sands of Time
desc: Time rewind mechanic! Parkour, Dagger of Time, Persian fairy tale beauty!

title: Viewtiful Joe
desc: Henshin a-go-go! VFX powers, cel-shaded style, Capcom's stylish action!

title: TimeSplitters 2
desc: Time-traveling shooter! Monkeys with guns, map maker, incredible multiplayer!

title: Manhunt
desc: Controversial violence! Rockstar's dark stealth game, plastic bag executions!

title: Halo 3
desc: Finish the Fight for real! Forge mode, Theater, and Believe campaign!

title: Halo: Reach
desc: Remember Reach! Noble Team's sacrifice, armor abilities, emotional prequel!

title: Gears of War
desc: Chainsaw bayonets! Cover shooting perfected, Locust Horde, and bros!

title: Gears of War 2
desc: Dom's wife! Bigger set pieces, Horde mode, and Carmine dies again!

title: BioShock
desc: Would you kindly? Rapture's dystopia, Big Daddies, Little Sisters, and THAT twist!

title: BioShock Infinite
desc: Columbia in the sky! Elizabeth, tears in reality, Songbird, and mind-bending ending!

title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion
desc: Stop right there criminal scum! Cyrodiil exploration, Shivering Isles, Patrick Stewart!

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
desc: Fus Ro Dah! Dragons return, arrow to the knee, and endless adventures!

title: Fallout 3
desc: War never changes! Capital Wasteland, Megaton bomb, VATS system!

title: Fallout: New Vegas
desc: Mojave Wasteland! Obsidian's branching story, Mr. House, and gambling!

title: Mass Effect
desc: Shepard's journey begins! Galaxy-spanning story, romance, and Saren!

title: Mass Effect 2
desc: Suicide mission! Loyalty missions, Collectors, improved combat, emotional choices!

title: Mass Effect 3
desc: Take back Earth! Reapers arrive, controversial ending, multiplayer addition!

title: Dead Space
desc: Necromorphs on the Ishimura! Strategic dismemberment, Isaac's silence, space terror!

title: Dead Space 2
desc: Isaac speaks! The Sprawl, eye needle scene, refined horror!

title: Assassin's Creed II
desc: Ezio's story! Renaissance Italy, parkour perfection, Templars vs Assassins!

title: Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood
desc: Recruit assassins! Rome setting, Borgia family, multiplayer introduction!

title: Red Dead Redemption
desc: John Marston's redemption! Wild West epic, Mexico, and that ending!

title: Grand Theft Auto IV
desc: Niko Bellic's American Dream! Liberty City, bowling with Roman, realistic physics!

title: L.A. Noire
desc: Facial scanning tech! 1940s detective work, interrogations, and noir atmosphere!

title: Batman: Arkham Asylum
desc: Be the Batman! Predator mode, Freeflow combat, Joker's takeover!

title: Batman: Arkham City
desc: Open-world Gotham! Hugo Strange, multiple villains, that ending!

title: Portal
desc: The cake is a lie! GLaDOS, thinking with portals, short but perfect!

title: Portal 2
desc: Cave Johnson! Co-op mode, gel mechanics, Wheatley's betrayal!

title: Left 4 Dead
desc: Four survivors vs zombies! AI Director, Tank, Witch, and teamwork!

title: Left 4 Dead 2
desc: Southern setting! Melee weapons, new special infected, Ellis stories!

title: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
desc: FPS revolution! All Ghillied Up, nuke scene, multiplayer killstreaks!

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
desc: No Russian! Spec Ops mode, Shepherd's betrayal, peak COD!

title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
desc: The numbers Mason! Cold War, zombies, and psychological thriller!

title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2
desc: Destructible environments! Rush mode, vehicles, squad gameplay!

title: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves
desc: That train! Nathan Drake's best, Himalayan adventure, Naughty Dog peak!

title: Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception
desc: Desert hallucinations! Young Drake flashback, cruise ship, Iram!

title: The Last of Us
desc: Joel and Ellie! Post-apocalyptic masterpiece, Clickers, emotional storytelling!

title: LittleBigPlanet
desc: Sackboy! Create, play, share! User-generated levels, charming physics!

title: Heavy Rain
desc: Press X to Jason! Origami Killer, branching story, QTE thriller!

title: Demon's Souls
desc: You Died! FromSoftware's souls-like origin, Boletaria, brutal difficulty!

title: inFAMOUS
desc: Electric superpowers! Karma system, Cole MacGrath, Empire City!

title: inFAMOUS 2
desc: New Marais! Beast threat, refined powers, multiple endings!

title: Resistance: Fall of Man
desc: Chimera invasion! PS3 launch title, alternate history, 40-player online!

title: Killzone 2
desc: Helghan warfare! Weighty gunplay, stunning visuals, Sony's Halo killer!

title: Super Mario Galaxy
desc: Mario in space! Gravity mechanics, beautiful orchestral score, planetoids!

title: Super Mario Galaxy 2
desc: Yoshi returns! More galaxies, green stars, perfection refined!

title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
desc: Wolf Link! Darker tone, Midna companion, traditional Zelda perfection!

title: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword
desc: Motion Plus swordplay! Origin story, Fi companion, pre-Hyrule adventure!

title: Metroid Prime 3: Corruption
desc: Phazon corruption! Motion controls, multiple planets, trilogy finale!

title: Donkey Kong Country Returns
desc: DK and Diddy return! Retro Studios revival, challenging levels, rocket barrels!

title: Kirby's Epic Yarn
desc: Fabric world! Adorable art style, co-op, impossible to die!

title: Super Smash Bros. Brawl
desc: Sonic joins! Subspace Emissary, Smash Balls, tripping mechanic!

title: Mario Kart Wii
desc: Bikes added! 12 players online, Coconut Mall, wheelie mechanic!

title: Wii Sports
desc: Motion control phenomenon! Bowling, tennis, grandparents playing games!

title: Monster Hunter Tri
desc: Underwater hunts! Capture or kill, crafting gear, cooperative grinding!

title: No More Heroes
desc: Lightsaber-like beam katana! Travis Touchdown, otaku assassin, Suda51 madness!

title: MadWorld
desc: Black, white, and red! Sin City-style violence, creative kills, M-rated Wii!

title: Rock Band
desc: Full band experience! Drums, bass, mic, guitar! Living room concerts!

title: Guitar Hero III
desc: Through the Fire and Flames! Peak Guitar Hero, boss battles!

title: Dark Souls
desc: Praise the Sun! Lordran interconnected world, bonfire comfort, prepare to die!

title: Borderlands
desc: Bazillion guns! Cell-shaded looter shooter, Pandora, Claptrap!

title: Borderlands 2
desc: Handsome Jack! Improved everything, Tiny Tina, butt stallion!

title: Saints Row: The Third
desc: Over-the-top insanity! Dildo bats, STAG, Steelport chaos!

title: Crackdown
desc: Orb collecting! Super-powered agent, Pacific City, vertical gameplay!

title: Alan Wake
desc: Writer's nightmare! Light vs darkness, Stephen King vibes, Bright Falls!

title: Mirror's Edge
desc: Faith's run! First-person parkour, clean aesthetic, 'Still Alive' song!

title: Limbo
desc: Monochrome dread! Boy searching for sister, spider, atmospheric indie!

title: Braid
desc: Time manipulation puzzles! Painted art, philosophical, indie revolution!

title: Fez
desc: 2D becomes 3D! Gomez, perspective rotation, secret language!

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
desc: Geralt's masterpiece! Bloody Baron, Gwent addiction, multiple endings, Polish perfection!

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
desc: Arthur Morgan's story! Most detailed world ever, gang loyalty, and that cough!

title: God of War (2018)
desc: BOY! Kratos as father, Norse mythology, Leviathan Axe, one-shot camera!

title: The Last of Us Part II
desc: Ellie's revenge! Divisive story, guitar scenes, unmatched animation, visceral combat!

title: Bloodborne
desc: Victorian horror! Trick weapons, Yharnam, cosmic dread, no shield!

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
desc: Robot dinosaurs! Aloy's bow, post-apocalyptic beauty, Guerrilla's pivot!

title: Spider-Man (2018)
desc: Best superhero game! Web-swinging perfection, Peter and Miles, Insomniac magic!

title: Ghost of Tsushima
desc: Samurai epic! Jin Sakai, Mongol invasion, wind guidance, kurosawa mode!

title: Persona 5
desc: Phantom Thieves! Stylish UI, jazz soundtrack, stealing hearts, time management!

title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
desc: Hesitation is defeat! Posture system, Sengoku Japan, shinobi prosthetic!

title: Dark Souls III
desc: Ashen One! Series finale, Lothric, boss rush, refined combat!

title: Nier: Automata
desc: 2B, 9S! Philosophical androids, multiple playthroughs, Yoko Taro's genius!

title: Death Stranding
desc: Kojima unleashed! Norman Reedus, baby in jar, walking simulator art!

title: Detroit: Become Human
desc: Android revolution! Branching narrative, Connor, Kara, Markus, choice matters!

title: Until Dawn
desc: Butterfly effect! Teen slasher film game, wendigo, motion capture acting!

title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
desc: Drake's finale! Brother Sam, Madagascar, rope swinging, emotional farewell!

title: Shadow of the Colossus (Remake)
desc: Blueprint reborn! Stunning remake, Valus first, emotional ending intact!

title: Ratchet & Clank (2016)
desc: Reimagined origin! Pixar-quality visuals, classic gameplay, movie tie-in!

title: Days Gone
desc: Biker vs freakers! Deacon St. John, hordes, Oregon setting, sleeper hit!

title: Dreams
desc: Media Molecule magic! Create anything, music, games, art, limitless!

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
desc: Open-air reinvention! Climb anything, cook, shrines, Hyrule reborn, Switch launch!

title: Super Mario Odyssey
desc: Cap possession! Kingdoms, New Donk City, T-Rex Mario, post-game moons!

title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
desc: Pandemic comfort! Island paradise, Tom Nook, crafting, terraforming, Isabelle!

title: Pokémon Sword/Shield
desc: Galar region! Dynamax, Wild Area, Wooloo, first console mainline Pokémon!

title: Splatoon 2
desc: Ink warfare! Turf wars, Salmon Run, squid kids, Nintendo's shooter!

title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
desc: Everyone is here! 89 characters, World of Light, Sakurai's magnum opus!

title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
desc: Definitive kart racer! Anti-gravity, 200cc, all DLC included!

title: Fire Emblem: Three Houses
desc: Choose your house! Edelgard, Dimitri, Claude! Calendar system, romance!

title: Xenoblade Chronicles 2
desc: Pyra and Mythra! Titans as worlds, Blades system, JRPG epic!

title: Hades
desc: Greek god roguelike! Zagreus escapes, boon combinations, Supergiant brilliance!

title: Celeste
desc: Climbing Celeste Mountain! Tight controls, mental health allegory, assist mode!

title: Hollow Knight
desc: Hallownest exploration! Beautiful hand-drawn, challenging, atmospheric!

title: Dead Cells
desc: Rogue-lite metroidvania! Fast combat, procedural generation, one more run!

title: Cuphead
desc: 1930s cartoon! Hand-drawn animation, brutal bosses, rubber hose style!

title: Ori and the Blind Forest
desc: Nibel forest beauty! Emotional story, tight platforming, gorgeous art!

title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
desc: Ori's sequel perfection! Combat expanded, Niwen, emotional conclusion!

desc: Britain's seasons! Open-world racing, car collection, changing weather!

title: Titanfall 2
desc: BT-7274! Time travel level, mech combat, criminally underrated campaign!

desc: Rip and tear returns! Glory kills, metal soundtrack, push forward combat!

title: Doom Eternal
desc: Slayer's pinnacle! Resource management, platforming, Mick Gordon removed!

title: Overwatch
desc: Hero shooter phenomenon! 6v6 teams, POTG, Blizzard's success, toxicity included!

title: Rainbow Six Siege

title: Destiny
desc: Bungie's looter shooter! Strikes, Raids, Vault of Glass, That wizard came from the moon!

title: Destiny 2
desc: Guardians return! Forsaken expansion, Cayde-6 death, better endgame!

title: The Division
desc: Dark Zone! Post-pandemic NYC, loot shooter, rogue agents, tense PvP!

title: Monster Hunter: World
desc: Mainstream breakthrough! New World, handler, SOS flares, western success!

title: Resident Evil 7
desc: First-person horror! Baker family, VR support, return to roots!

desc: Perfect remake! RE Engine, Mr. X stalking, Leon and Claire reimagined!

title: Control
desc: Remedy's SCP! Jesse Faden, shifting architecture, Oldest House, telekinesis!

title: Prey (2017)
desc: Talos I station! Mimics, immersive sim, multiple solutions, Arkane brilliance!

title: Dishonored 2
desc: Emily or Corvo! Karnaca, timepiece level, chaos system, clockwork soldiers!

title: Far Cry 3
desc: Did I ever tell you the definition of insanity? Vaas, Rook Islands, towers!

desc: Pagan Min! Kyrat, elephants, Shangri-La, co-op chaos!

title: Far Cry 5
desc: Montana cult! The Seed family, Boomer dog, nuclear ending!

title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
desc: Pirate life! Edward Kenway, naval combat, sea shanties, best AC!

title: Assassin's Creed Origins
desc: Bayek's journey! Egypt, RPG reboot, hitbox combat, Senu eagle!

title: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
desc: Ancient Greece! Kassandra or Alexios, choice dialogue, mythical beasts!

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
desc: Viking England! Eivor, settlement building, raid system, long game!

title: Watch Dogs 2
desc: Marcus Holloway! San Francisco hacking, DedSec, selfie emote, improved sequel!

title: Wolfenstein II: The New Colossus
desc: BJ Blazkowicz! Nazi-occupied America, dual-wielding, Venus level!

title: Metro Exodus
desc: Artyom's journey! Russian wasteland, Aurora train, atmospheric shooter!

title: Hitman (2016)
desc: Agent 47 reborn! Episodic missions, Paris fashion show, creative kills!

title: Hitman 2
desc: Mumbai crowds! Miami race, Isle of Sgàil, refined assassination!

title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
desc: Cal Kestis! Order 66 survivor, lightsaber combat, Respawn's Star Wars!

title: Batman: Arkham Knight
desc: Batmobile! Gotham City open, Scarecrow, tank battles, trilogy finale!

title: Demon's Souls (Remake)
desc: Bluepoint remake! Boletaria reborn, stunning graphics, PS5 launch showpiece!

title: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
desc: Miles shines! Venom powers, winter Harlem, Into the Spider-Verse vibes!

title: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
desc: SSD portal tech! Rivet introduced, dimensional rifts, graphical showcase!

title: Returnal
desc: Bullet hell roguelike! Selene's loop, Atropos, DualSense haptics, Housemarque!

title: Horizon Forbidden West
desc: Aloy's west! Underwater exploration, San Francisco ruins, machine tribes!

title: Gran Turismo 7
desc: Polyphony returns! Café mode, classic tracks, realistic simulation!

title: Resident Evil Village
desc: Tall vampire lady! Ethan continues, four lords, merchant Duke!

title: Resident Evil 4 (Remake)
desc: Modernized classic! Over-shoulder refinement, Ashley improved, knife parrying!

title: Final Fantasy XVI
desc: Eikon battles! Clive's story, DMC combat, mature FF, spectacular summons!

title: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth
desc: Open-world Gaia! Remake sequel, Red XIII playable, expanded narrative!

title: Halo Infinite
desc: Master Chief returns! Zeta Halo, grappling hook, free multiplayer!

title: Forza Horizon 5
